channel.title: † DISABLE PKING for a cer†ain plaŸer †
channel.description:
Okay pretend u have a server where team pking isn't aloud. And pretend sum1 team pk's. Can u make a command disable pking for that person?
here's what i mean:
[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("disable pk for (playername)") && playerRights >= 3) { disable pking for (playername) sendMessage("pking has been disabled for you due to you team pking!!!!");[/code]
and is it possible to make a command like this:
[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("enable pk for (playername)") && playerRights >= 3) { enable pking for (playername) sendMessage("you are able to pk agen! next time, folo the rules noob!");[/code]
thanks

item.title: † DISABLE PKING for a cer†ain plaŸer †
item.dc:creator: @fallen_darkness fallen darkness
item.description:
@fallen_darkness wrote:

[quote=“Lusfr, post:7, topic:187412”]add this in you attack booleans or methods

if(varible){
sendMessgae("your ass has been disabled);
}
return;[/quote]k thanks lusfr.

Read full topic

item.title: † DISABLE PKING for a cer†ain plaŸer †
item.dc:creator: @zubmage zubmage
item.description:
@zubmage wrote:

That won’t make a difference.

I haven’t even tried this, but its just an idea.

Find the command that lets you go to the pk area.

And use your own bit of coding, use the same type of coding as ::warn etc just add teleblock()

item.title: † DISABLE PKING for a cer†ain plaŸer †
item.dc:creator: @fallen_darkness fallen darkness
item.description:
@fallen_darkness wrote:

[quote=“zubmage, post:4, topic:187412”]No but its a much simpler form of what you DID ask for.
Rather than let the player go to pk but not be able to attack other players, simply stop him/her from teleporting there…[/quote]wut if they log out den back in…
